channel.title: Character disappears?
channel.description: Yeah, searching around in the class8 file, I found a Bandos helm, whip, kiteshield and gloves. Except, with the kiteshield, it'll sometimes make your character disappear. Any ideas on how to fix this?

item.title: Character disappears?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:2, topic:290729”]This is client related. Post this in the client help section, and I’m sure you’ll receive some helpful responses.[/quote]You never know. Maybe the server isn’t sending the appearance update properly o.O

Anyway, my guess is the model is fucked up (Has either a bad position or a bad animation). Unzip the gz model and open the dat file with DAT Maker, and then make sure you set the required stuff, like in SilentCJ’s tutorial. Then remake the dat, gzip it, place in your client models folder, and then re-add it.

Read full topic
